name: Full Fact
membership: Full Fact is a member of the National Council of Voluntary Organisations in the UK.
memberOrga: Full Fact is not a membership organisation.
goal: Full Fact is the UK's independent and non-partisan factchecking charity. Our aim is to promote well-informed public debate. We do this by factchecking claims made by politicians and the media and providing high quality information to a public audience directly on our site, via the media and on social media.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Full Fact has engaged with the European Commission's Multi-Stakeholder Conference on fake news on 13th and 14th November and is applying to be part of the High Level Group. We will be submitting evidence to the consultation.
